definition: Tian Ji races his horses (and accepts one loss in order to ensure two wins) (idiom)
to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Have you heard Tianji's horse racing story?
sentences.chinese: 你聽過田忌賽馬的故事麼？
